website_summaries.verdict: A more robust capper made with high-quality materials and a more ergonomic design.
pros: Longer handles made of metal and a rubber grip offer more leverage to properly seal a cap around the lip of a bottle
The necessary force is easier and more comfortable to create
cons: Positioning and stabilizing the bottle cap can be more difficult than professional options

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This capper worked great. Seems to be built well. Sturdy,metal construction. The key to using this is to make sure you use inward pressure on the handles increase of downward pressure. If you just push straight down it puts a lot of pressure on the bottle. If you press inward, all of the force goes to the cap. It capped screw off bottles as well (they just won't unscrew when opening). There was some mild difficult getting a few bottles free after capping, but nothing a little wiggling didn't fix. It won't work on wider necked bottles like Stella Artois or Modelo because of the low clearance neck grips. Perfectly fit Budweiser and Guinness bottles.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price. Durable all metal construction. Works on short and long necks. Comes with quality caps. It does leave a ring in the center of caps installed on long necks, but barely noticeable when used on short neck bottles. I got the correct U.S. size with 1 click ordering. So far only used to cap 50 bottles. I will edit if it breaks. If you are concerned that all plastic units may break, or shatter the necks on your bottles, then this is a good alternative. I have had no issues. Works well.

customer_reviews.title: Good for one-time use
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this because you are a first-time brewer who is just trying it out, this product will serve its purpose and the price will not make you feel guilty for using it one time. However, if you are planning on trying your hand at brewing frequently: get something that is better quality and that allows you to cap your bottles faster than this. The price may be tempting, but: you get what you pay for.
